sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"意见，建议"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: advice, opinion, proposal, suggestion, recommendation, view
means: advice ：普通用词，侧重依据个人经验、学识和正确判断而提出的忠言。
opinion ：日常用词，泛指对某事物的想法和意见。
proposal ：指正式提出来供研究、采纳或实行的建议。
suggestion ：普通用词，语气比advice婉转客气，也不如proposal正式。着重为改进工作、解决困难等提出的建议，有时含所提建议不一定正确，仅供参考的意味。
recommendation ：指在自己经历的基础上而提出的有益建议、意见或忠告。
view ：侧重指对重大的或引起公众关注的问题所持的看法和态度。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"意见，看法，见解"之意。
means: opinion ： 普通用词，使用广泛。多指初步的或缺证据支持因而不十分肯定的意见或看法。
view ： 侧重指个人对较广泛或重大问题所持的看法，常用复数形式。
sentiment ： 着重指基于情感而非推理所得出的，已经固定了的看法，常用复数形式。
idea ： 普通用词，通常指凭感觉和想象所形成的看法或意见。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"景色，风景"之意。
means: scene ： 指具体的、局部的或一时的景色，可以是自然形成的，也可人工造成的。
view ： 普通和词，多指从远处或高处所见的景色。
sight ： 侧重指旅游观光的风光，包括城市景色或自然风光景色。也指人造景物或奇特的景色。
scenery ： 指一个国家或某一地区的整体自然风景。
landscape ： 多指在内陆的自然风光。

stems_affixes.word_buile: view看,查→观察, 观看→风景
inter在……之间+view看,查→n.&v.接见, 会见
sur在……上面+vey=view看,查→在上面看,从上往下看→俯瞰→测量,调查
view看,查→观察, 观看→风景

sentences.cn: 她发表自己的看法, 认为他是个傻瓜。

sentences.en: I take the view that we should put less money into nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们应该在核武器上少花钱。

entry.def: Your views on something are the beliefs or opinions that you have about it, for example whether you think it is good, bad, right, or wrong.

example.ex: Washington and Moscow are believed to have similar views on Kashmir...
example.tran: 据信华盛顿和莫斯科在克什米尔问题上的看法相似。

example.ex: I take the view that she should be stopped as soon as possible...
example.tran: 我认为应该尽快阻止她。

entry.def: Your view of a particular subject is the way that you understand and think about it.
entry.tran: （对某一问题的）看法，考虑，思量

example.ex: The drama takes an idealistic, even a naive view of the subject...
example.tran: 这部戏在对待这一主题上有些理想化，甚至是天真。

example.ex: The whole point was to get away from a Christian-centred view of religion...
example.tran: 其主旨就是要抛开以基督教为中心的宗教观。

entry.def: If you view something in a particular way, you think of it in that way.

example.ex: First-generation Americans view the United States as a land of golden opportunity...
example.tran: 第一代美国人认为美国是一个充满了机遇的国度。

example.ex: Abigail's mother Linda views her daughter's talent with a mixture of pride and worry...
example.tran: 阿比盖尔的母亲琳达带着一种又骄傲又担忧的复杂情绪看待女儿的才华。

entry.def: The view from a window or high place is everything which can be seen from that place, especially when it is considered to be beautiful.
entry.tran: 景观;景色;风景;(尤指）美景

example.ex: The view from our window was one of beautiful green countryside...
example.tran: 从我们的窗口能看见一片美丽的绿色田园风光。

example.ex: Each of the rooms has a superb view of Pissouri Bay.
example.tran: 每个房间都能将皮苏里湾的美景尽收眼底。

entry.def: If you have a view of something, you can see it.

example.ex: He stood up to get a better view of the blackboard...
example.tran: 为了更清楚地看到黑板上的内容，他站了起来。

example.ex: He stopped in the doorway, blocking her view.
example.tran: 他站在门口，挡住了她的视线。

entry.def: You use view in expressions to do with being able to see something. For example, if something is in view, you can see it. If something is in full view of everyone, everyone can see it.
entry.tran: 在能看得见的地方/在（所有人）视线内

example.ex: She was lying there in full view of anyone who walked by...
example.tran: 她躺在那里，过往的人都能看见她。

example.ex: A group of riders came into view on the dirt road...
example.tran: 一群骑车的人出现在那条土路上。

entry.def: If you view something, you look at it for a particular purpose.

example.ex: They came back to view the house again...
example.tran: 他们又回来查看了一遍房子。

example.ex: Twenty-five thousand mourners passed to view the body.
example.tran: 2.5万名送葬者前来瞻仰死者遗容。

entry.def: If you view a television programme, video, or film, you watch it.

example.ex: We have viewed the video recording of the incident...
example.tran: 我们看过了该事件的录像。

example.ex: 'Elizabeth R', a TV portrait of the Queen, had record viewing figures.
example.tran: 关于女王的电视专题片《伊丽莎白女王》创下了收视纪录。

entry.def: View refers to the way in which a piece of text or graphics is displayed on a computer screen.
entry.tran: （文本或图表在计算机屏幕上的）显示方式

example.ex: To see the current document in full-page view, click the Page Zoom Full button.
example.tran: 要完整显示当前文件，请按“全屏显示”按钮。	PRHASES

entry.def: If you take a dim view or a poor view of someone or something, you disapprove of them or have a low opinion of them.
entry.tran: 对…评价不高;对…持否定看法

example.ex: They took a dim view of local trade unionists...
example.tran: 他们对当地的工会会员们评价很低。

example.ex: The judge took a dim view and I spent six years in prison.
example.tran: 法官对此并不赞成，我因此蹲了6年的监狱。

entry.def: You use in my view when you want to indicate that you are stating a personal opinion, which other people might not agree with.

example.ex: In my view things won't change...
example.tran: 依我看，事情不会改变。

example.ex: There is, in my view, a simple explanation...
example.tran: 在我看来，有一个简单的解释。

entry.def: You use in view of when you are taking into consideration facts that have just been mentioned or are just about to be mentioned.

example.ex: In view of the fact that Hobson was not a trained economist his achievements were remarkable...
example.tran: 考虑到霍布森不是科班出身的经济学家，他可谓是成就非凡。

example.ex: In view of this, the decision may not be easy.
example.tran: 考虑到这点，可能很难作出决定。

entry.def: If you have something in view, you are aware of it and your actions are aimed towards it.

example.ex: They have very clear career aims in view...
example.tran: 他们有非常明确的职业目标。

example.ex: Ackroyd worked out this whole plot with one objective in view.
example.tran: 阿克罗伊德制订出这一整套秘密计划就是为了达到一个目的。

entry.def: If you take the long view, you consider what is likely to happen in the future over a long period, rather than thinking only about things that are going to happen soon.
entry.tran: 从长远来看;作长远打算

example.ex: Some investors are taking the long view...
example.tran: 一些投资者是从长远角度考虑的。

example.ex: Taking a long view of the project, I began to think in terms of the rehearsal schedules required.
example.tran: 为了对这个项目作长远打算，我开始根据要求的排练计划考虑问题。

entry.def: If something such as a work of art is on view, it is shown in public for people to look at.

example.ex: A significant exhibition of contemporary sculpture will be on view at the Portland Gallery.
example.tran: 一场关于当代雕塑的重要展览即将在波特兰美术馆开展。

entry.def: If you do something with a view to doing something else, you do it because you hope it will result in that other thing being done.

example.ex: He has called a meeting of all parties tomorrow, with a view to forming a national reconciliation government.
example.tran: 为了组建一个协调各方利益的全国性联合政府，他已召集所有党派参加明天的会议。

means.word_mean: 1. a way of regarding situations or topics etc.;

sentences.sentence: "consider what follows from the positivist view"

means.word_mean: 2. the visual percept of a region;

sentences.sentence: "the most desirable feature of the park are the beautiful views"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of looking or seeing or observing;

sentences.sentence: "he tried to get a better view of it"
"his survey of the battlefield was limited"
"they were soon out of view"

means.word_mean: 5. a personal belief or judgment that is not founded on proof or certainty;

sentences.sentence: "my opinion differs from yours"
"what are your thoughts on Haiti?"

means.word_mean: 6. a message expressing a belief about something; the expression of a belief that is held with confidence but not substantiated by positive knowledge or proof;

sentences.sentence: "his opinions appeared frequently on the editorial page"

means.word_mean: 7. purpose; the phrase `with a view to' means `with the intention of' or `for the purpose of';

sentences.sentence: "he took the computer with a view to pawning it"

means.word_mean: 8. graphic art consisting of the graphic or photographic representation of a visual percept;

sentences.sentence: "he painted scenes from everyday life"
"figure 2 shows photographic and schematic views of the equipment"

means.word_mean: 9. the range of interest or activity that can be anticipated;

sentences.sentence: "It is beyond the horizon of present knowledge"
"they look the same in outward view"
"She views this quite differently from me"
"I consider her to be shallow"
"I don't see the situation quite as negatively as you do"
"view a problem"
"view a show on television"
"This program will be seen all over the world"
"view an exhibition"
"Catch a show on Broadway"
"see a movie"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French vieue, feminine past participle of veoir 'see', from Latin videre. The verb dates from the early 16th cent

means: 看法，态度
观看，视线
景色
风景画/照
显示方式
把…视为，看待
（观）看，查看
virtual interactive environment for workgroup 工作组虚拟交互环境
virtual interactive environment workstation 虚拟交互环境工作站
video information exchange window 视频信息交换窗口
Vital Information for Education and Work (education-on-microfilm program) 教育和工作的重要信息（关于微缩胶片的教育计划）
[地名] [美国] 维尤

sentences.en: Failing to recognize that, he notes, leads to “an overly simplified view of what the solutions might be.

sentences.cn: 当然，我们需要对那些充满不满和敌意的青少年多加关注，但我们不应该让这些极端案例歪曲了我们对大部分年轻人的看法。
sentences.en: We, of course, need to pay attention to youngsters who are filled with discontent and hostility, but we should not allow these extreme cases to distort our view of most young people.

sentences.en: OK, and you have very strong views about universities in Canada. Could you please explain?

sentences.cn: 就我的个人看法, 我们的世界能够经得住一点点.
sentences.en: In my personal view, our world could stand a little saving.

sentences.en: He stated his views on the question at the meeting.

sentences.cn: 然而, 人们对正在讨论的问题的看法是有分歧的.
sentences.en: People's views, however, are divergent on the matter in question.

sentences.en: I'm afraid that my views on their private life are unprintable!

sentences.cn: 但这些公寓很受欢迎，因为他们有着通风的玻璃、优美的风景、典雅的建筑细节和结构比例，这些都是当时流行的抽象艺术的特征。

sentences.en: He was already on slow cruise mode and doing 60 kph enjoying the view.

sentences.en: I love the view out this window.

sentences.en: We paused in admiration of the beautiful view.

sentences.cn: 在好天气的日子里山顶风景让人激动不已.
sentences.en: On a good day the view from the summit is extremely exciting.

sentences.en: We might just as well have enjoyed the view of the river without the litter.

sentences.cn: 这是个有着海港 、 山丘和奇丽海滩风景的小海湾.
sentences.en: It's a little bay with harbours, mountains and magnificent beach views.

sentences.cn: 它同时也展现这座城市的一些极美的风景.
sentences.en: It offers some excellent views of the city as well.

sentences.en: I want a double room with a view.

sentences.cn: 我们住在12层, 从阳台看出去风景很美.
sentences.en: We are on the 12 floor, so there's a very nice view from the balcony.

sentences.cn: 我们要不断地开拓自己的视域、增长见识.
sentences.en: We should constantly broaden our views and expand our knowledge.

sentences.cn: 该项目的别墅及公寓都是围绕而建,形成良好的景观视域.
sentences.en: The project's villas and apartments are built around to create a good view of the landscape.

sentences.en: Emergent instruction a special instruction form that viewed from the generative thinking mode.
